text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Attention! The paperwork to extend<n>Fine Motion's study
abroad period is<n>ready, and the proposal for race<n>
admission is written!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Wahaha! Think nothing of it! Tracen<n>Academy takes great
pride in making<n>Umamusume dreams come true. Fine<n>
Motion is no exception!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Not to mention—you did a great deal ofthe work yourself! I must commendyour work ethic. It is superb!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
However, what remains to be done<n>is... pivotal! Fine Motion,
are you<n>ready?

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
You must obtain parental consent<n>yourself. Your father
needs to hear<n>your goals from you!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Understood!

text_block_list.name: Security Captain
text_block_list.text:
We've confirmed that both parties<n>are ready to begin. Now...
please allow<n>me to start the call.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The captain readies a screen at eye<n>level, and then a
moment later, we're<n>on video.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: It's been too long, Father.

text_block_list.name: Fine's Father
text_block_list.text:
Fine... I've seen your proposal, so I'll<n>skip directly to my
primary<n>concern—has your short time abroad<n>dulled your
sense of duty to this<n>country?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Never. I am fully aware of my<n>responsibilities, and it is with
nothing<n>but pride that I endeavor to fulfill<n>them. They are
precisely why I have<n>hesitated to make this selfish request.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
However, I... I can no longer deny my<n>heart. Now, here at
Tracen, I wish so<n>strongly to run!

text_block_list.name: Fine's Father
text_block_list.text:
...The passions of one's youth are<n>fleeting, but the future
they distract<n>you from will come regardless. Should<n>you
indulge in those fantasies, you'll<n>find yourself miserably
unprepared to<n>live without them.

text_block_list.name: Fine's Father
text_block_list.text:
Fine... You are wise beyond your<n>years. I know you can see
how rocky<n>the path that tempts you is, so tell<n>me—do you
wish to take it even so?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Yes, I do!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
You see, Father, it's too late. I have<n>already run with all my
heart, a rival at<n>my side, and felt that burning desire<n>to be
faster than anyone!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
I can't stop... nor do I wish to. I want<n>to race! I want to push
myself, and<n>see how far my own two legs can<n>take me!

text_block_list.name: Fine's Father
text_block_list.text: ...I see.

text_block_list.name: Fine's Father
text_block_list.text:
If you are so certain of your choice, I<n>will have you
demonstrate your<n>conviction. Show me that you are<n>
prepared, determined... and have<n>potential worth training.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And now, Fine Motion has her<n>father's consent to run in the
next<n>tryouts.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
One, two... One, two... Whew. I have<n>my work cut out for me,
if I'm going to<n>show Father results.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
This race will draw eyes, and I have a<n>country to do proud...
I'll prove that<n>I've got what it takes!
choice_data_list:
...Don't put too much pressure on yourself,
okay?

...Don't put too much pressure on yourself,
okay?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: What pressure? I'm fine! I couldn't<n>be happier!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: I mean... I get to run!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Now, Trainer! I'll pull out all the stops,<n>so train me like
there's no tomorrow!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
True to her word, Fine Motion<n>dedicates herself to practicing
for the<n>tryouts.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Days go by, and then...

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Inhale... Whew!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Okay! Here goes!

text_block_list.name: Security Captain
text_block_list.text:
Trainer. Our preparations are<n>complete. I'll put you through,
so<n>please standby at the monitor.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Behind the screen, Fine's father<n>watches his daughter's
gate.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Wooooo!

text_block_list.name: Fine's Father
text_block_list.text:
...As I understand, you are the trainer<n>who first noticed
Fine's true feelings<n>towards racing.

text_block_list.name: Fine's Father
text_block_list.text:
You know, she's always been a<n>clever one. Fine accepted
our family's<n>duty from an early age, and has<n>played her
part perfectly<n>since—without letting the girl inside<n>show.

text_block_list.name: Fine's Father
text_block_list.text: Now, though... We'll see.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Huff... Huff...

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: More... Keep... going! I can still go<n>faster! Haaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Fine's Father
text_block_list.text:
(Ah, that look. It's been so long, I<n>almost forgot... that
twinkle of light in<n>her eyes.)

text_block_list.name: Young Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Ready... Go! Ahahahaha!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
And the winner of this tryout race is<n>Fine Motion! Fine
Motion takes first!<n>What an amazing performance!

text_block_list.name: Fine's Father
text_block_list.text:
...Well. I suppose I, too, should allow<n>myself the occasional
selfish wish. I<n>wish her success—not as the head of<n>our
house... but as her plain, simple<n>father.

text_block_list.name: Fine's Father
text_block_list.text:
(I should have known she'd follow in<n>her sister's footsteps
eventually...<n>Racing is in their blood.)

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: ...I can't believe it.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Oh, I must be dreaming! Father really<n>gave permission for
me to race!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Thank you! And I believe this calls for<n>a "winner winner
ramen dinner"! ♪

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Ahem. If you would be so kind...

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Would you escort me to the<n>restaurant, Trainer?
choice_data_list: Heh. As you wish, my liege.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Together, we head out to<n>celebrate—and finally put that
Ramen<n>Rampage coupon I'd been saving to<n>use.
